event.fsmi: FSMI - Math & Computer Science Student Council
event.fsmi_desc: Voluntary office hours and support at events. Responsibility for the student council breakfast.
event.hadiko_ev_desc: Voluntary association work in the occupancy committee, roof top ministry, billiard ministry and work group public work. In addition, numerous voluntary hallway work for finances, the beverage ministry, hallway cleaning, hallway eating and hallway tournaments.
event.hadiko_vev_desc: Voluntary association work and finances for countless social events.
event.kit_gamejam_desc: Founder and board member of the voluntary college group for the promotion of game development culture at Karlsruhe colleges.
event.level42_desc: Foundation of the volunteer group to welcome and introduce first-year Master's students.
event.lila_pause_desc: Volunteer welcome & introduction of first-year students. Also weekly regulars' tables with occasional specials. 2020-2023 Main organizer.
event.mannheim_desc: Member of the pupil advisory board of the Technoseums Mannheim 2015-2016. Pupil studying for two semesters at the University of Mannheim 2018. Participation in the brass orchestra of the music school. One-time participation in "Jugend musiziert" as piano accompaniment.
event.moll_desc: Participation in various orchestras/choirs every school year, from 2014 including mentor work. Robotics AG with FLL participation. Project manager during the project days about music history 2015.

cookies.body: This website does not use analytical tracking of any kind. This website uses cookies. These are small text files that the web browser stores on the end device. Cookies help to make the website more user-friendly, effective and secure. Some cookies are "session cookies." Such cookies are deleted by themselves at the end of the browser session. In contrast, other cookies remain on your terminal device until they are manually deleted by yourself. Such cookies help to reuse settings made when returning to the website. With a modern web browser, the setting of cookies can be monitored, restricted or prevented. Many web browsers can be configured to automatically delete cookies when the program is closed. Disabling cookies may result in limited functionality of the website.
cookies.title: Analytics/Cookies/External Resources etc.?

data.body: This website does not collect any data from you. The operator specified in the imprint only learns about you if you write him an e-mail. Thereby the operator learns your e-mail address and your name. This data will only be used to answer your request and will not be passed on to third parties.
data.title: What data is collected by this website?

rights.body: According to DSGVO and BDSG, you can request information, updating, blocking or deletion of all your data at any time. Your contact person for this is the above-mentioned operator of this website. In addition, I am obliged to remind you of your right to object to this consent at any time and, if necessary, to complain to a supervisory authority about me.
rights.title: What are my rights?

projects.intro: Over the past few years, I've worked on some smaller or larger projects. However, I am particularly proud of the projects listed here! If you're interested, just take a closer look at the code. Everything is open-source!
